explains: adj. 令人不安的，引起恐慌的
v. 打扰，妨碍；使焦虑，使烦恼（disturb 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: disturbing force 扰动力；摄动力；干扰力

sentences.en: The newspaper has unearthed some disturbing facts.
sentences.cn: 报纸揭发了一些令人不安的真相。

sentences.en: There was something about him she found disturbing.
sentences.cn: 她发现他身上有些东西让她觉得不安。

sentences.en: He looked at her in a way she found oddly disturbing.
sentences.cn: 他异样地望着她，令她局促不安。
